Project.name: Airboost
Project.description: High-performance SQLite cache that turns your Airtable into a blazing-fast, always-available API.

Hero.description: Stop waiting for Airtable's slow API. Airboost caches your data in SQLite for sub-millisecond queries, unlimited throughput, and zero downtime.

Features.title: Everything you need
Features.subtitle: Built for developers who love Airtable's flexibility but need production-grade performance.

blazingFast.name: Blazing Fast
blazingFast.description: Sub-millisecond queries powered by SQLite. Your data served instantly, no more waiting for the Airtable API.

zeroDowntime.name: Zero Downtime
zeroDowntime.description: Atomic dual-database swap strategy ensures your API never goes down, even during cache refreshes.

typeSafety.name: Type Safety
typeSafety.description: Full TypeScript support with auto-generated types based on your actual Airtable schema.

selfHosted.name: Self-Hosted
selfHosted.description: Your data stays on your infrastructure. Deploy anywhere Bun runs — Railway, Fly.io, or any VPS.

attachments.name: Attachment Handling
attachments.description: Automatic file downloading and local serving. No more expired Airtable attachment URLs.

realTimeSync.name: Real-time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Webhook support for instant updates when your data changes in Airtable.

Deploy.title: Ready to deploy?
Deploy.subtitle: Get your own instance running in 60 seconds. One-click deploy with automatic HTTPS and zero-downtime deployments.
Deploy.alternative: Or self-host anywhere Bun runs — Fly.io, Render, DigitalOcean, any VPS.

Footer.copyright: © 2026 Guischk · MIT License · Built with Bun

LocaleDemo.title: Internationalization
LocaleDemo.description: Live demo of next-intl: locale switching, translated strings, and formatted values.
